document_data.name: Thought Shield
document_data.mainbody: '''''Thought shield''''' was a [[psionic]] devotion of the [[telepathy]] [[discipline]] that allowed the [[psionicist]] to create a glowing shield that repelled psionic attacks.
document_data.Effects: A ''thought shield'' excelled at protecting the mind against a ''[[psychic crush]]'' attack but was susceptible to an ''[[ego whip]]''.

Notable Users.Individuals: * [[Vhondryl]], a psionicist in [[Skullport]] and head of the [[Hall of Mental Splendor]]{{Cite dragon/172/Seeing the Sights in Skullport|12, 14, 88}}
